languages.text: "Инфоклеймо. Скоморох своим рукопожатием оставил мне его, и ласераксы атаковали всех меченных. А вот вас, Вольный Торговец, бестии не рвались растерзать. Видимо, им вы нужны жив{mf|ым|ой}, но без моей защиты".

traits.locale_text: "Инфоклеймо. Ну конечно. Решил от меня избавиться, чтобы не мешался. Но на вас ласераксы реагировали иначе, Вольный Торговец. Не удивлюсь, если им приказали оставить вас в живых".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."
languages.original_text: "Инфоклеймо. Скоморох своим рукопожатием оставил мне его, и ласераксы атаковали всех меченных. А вот вас, Вольный Торговец, бестии не рвались растерзать. Видимо, им вы нужны жив{mf|ым|ой}, но без моей защиты".

languages.text: 「データ刻印です。宮廷道化師が私と握手したときに仕掛けたものです。あの後、ラセラックスたちは刻印された者たちを次々に襲い始めました。ですがローグトレーダー、あの獣たちはあなたを引き裂こうとはまったくしていませんでした。どうやら、あなたは生きたまま捕らえられるのを望まれているらしい─私の守護はなしで」
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: 「データ刻印です。宮廷道化師が私と握手したときに仕掛けたものです。あの後、ラセラックスたちは刻印された者たちを次々に襲い始めました。ですがローグトレーダー、あの獣たちはあなたを引き裂こうとはまったくしていませんでした。どうやら、あなたは生きたまま捕らえられるのを望まれているらしい─私の守護はなしで」

languages.text: "Veri damgası. Saray soytarısı elimi sıktığında bunu bana aktardı. Ardından laserakslar, damgalanan herkese saldırdı. Fakat hayvanlar sizi parçalamaya hevesli durmuyordu Hür Tacir. Görünüşe göre sizi korumamdan yoksun, sağ istiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: "Bir veri damgası. Saray soytarısı elimi sıktığında bunu bana aktardı. Ardından laserakslar damgalanan herkese saldırdı. Fakat canavarlar sizi parçalamaya hiç hevesli görünmüyordu Hür Tacir. Görünüşe göre sizi korumam olmadan, sağ istiyorlar."

languages.text: «Una marca de datos. El bufón de la corte me la puso al darme la mano. Después, los lacerax atacaron a todas las personas marcadas. No obstante, las bestias no parecían interesadas en desgarrarl{mf|o|a} a usted, Comerciante. Parece que l{mf|e|a} quieren viv{mf|o|a}, pero sin mi protección».
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: «Una marca de datos. El bufón de la corte me la puso al darme la mano. Después, los lacerax atacaron a todas las personas marcadas. No obstante, las bestias no parecían interesadas en desgarrarl{mf|o|a} a usted, Comerciante. Parece que l{mf|e|a} quieren viv{mf|o|a}, pero sin mi protección».

languages.text: “是数据印记。那个宫廷小丑和我握手的时候，把那个印记打在了我手上。在那之后，异虎袭击了所有遭到标记的人。不过，那群异虎完全没有撕碎你的意图，行商浪人。看来，那个幕后黑手想把我除掉，将你在没有保护的情况下活捉。”
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: “是数据印记。那个宫廷小丑和我握手的时候，把那个印记打在了我手上。在那之后，异虎袭击了所有遭到标记的人。不过，那群异虎完全没有撕碎你的意图，行商浪人。看来，那个幕后黑手想把我除掉，将你在没有保护的情况下活捉。”

languages.text: « Une marque numérique. Le bouffon de la cour me l'a apposée lorsqu'il m'a serré la main, après quoi les lacérax ont attaqué tous ceux qui en étaient porteurs. En revanche, ils ont pris bien soin de vous épargner, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Apparemment, on vous veut {mf|vivant|vivante}, mais sans ma protection. »
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: « Une marque numérique. Le bouffon de la cour me l'a apposée lorsqu'il m'a serré la main, après quoi les lacérax ont attaqué tous ceux qui en étaient porteurs. En revanche, ils ont pris bien soin de vous épargner, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Apparemment, on vous veut {mf|vivant|vivante}, mais sans ma protection. »

languages.text: "Ein Datenbrand. Der Hofnarr hat mich damit versehen, als er meine Hand schüttelte. Dann griffen die Laceraxe jeden an, der gebrandmarkt war. Allerdings wollten Euch die Bestien keineswegs in Stücke reißen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Man will Euch offenbar lebend, allerdings ohne meinen Schutz."
languages.original_text: "A data-brand. The court fool put it on me when he shook my hand. Then the laceraxes attacked everyone who had been marked. However, the beasts were not at all eager to tear you apart, Rogue Trader. It appears you are wanted alive, but without my protection."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Datenbrand. Der Hofnarr hat mich damit versehen, als er meine Hand schüttelte. Dann griffen die Laceraxe jeden an, der gebrandmarkt war. Allerdings wollten Euch die Bestien keineswegs in Stücke reißen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Man will Euch offenbar lebend, allerdings ohne meinen Schutz."
